audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Strong evidence of platform business model - 80+ airlines connecting demonstrates network effects and platform adoption beyond traditional OEM role
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific metric (80 airlines), named organization (Airbus), credible source
audited_claims.notes: Platform adoption metric validates transformation from aircraft manufacturer to data platform provider

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Describes platform capabilities that enable new value creation - automated reporting and benchmarking represent new service offerings beyond traditional manufacturing
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific functional capabilities described, authoritative first-party source
audited_claims.notes: Platform services represent new revenue streams and value propositions

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Network effects are core to platform transformation - more participants create exponentially more value for all users
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Clear description of platform dynamics, authoritative source

apqc_functions.name: Develop and manage enterprise-wide knowledge management (KM) capability

audited_claims.notes: Network effects demonstrate genuine platform economics, not just data sharing

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Predictive maintenance preventing faults represents new value creation - moving from reactive to predictive service model
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific customer (easyJet), concrete outcome (prevented faults), credible source
audited_claims.notes: Demonstrates platform enabling new service capabilities for customers

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: 60x data increase enables fundamentally different analytics capabilities - quantum leap in data foundation for platform
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific metric (60x), named technology (FOMAX), specific customer context

audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific technical incident (A330neo), detailed technical explanation, authoritative source
audited_claims.notes: Platform analytics creating new safety value beyond traditional engineering

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Proactive failure detection represents transformation from reactive to predictive safety model - new value creation in risk management
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Clear outcome description, industry significance noted, credible source
audited_claims.notes: Data-driven safety represents new industry capability enabled by platform

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: 4x faster IT delivery could enable transformation but lacks context about what new capabilities this enables
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific metric (4x) but lacks detail on measurement methodology or baseline

audited_claims.notes: Efficiency improvement that may enable transformation but needs more context on strategic impact

audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific application described, named technology (MuleSoft), but limited outcome metrics
audited_claims.notes: Could be Tier 1 optimization rather than transformation - needs clarification on strategic impact

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Real-time supply chain visibility is valuable but appears to be operational improvement rather than business model change

apqc_functions.name: Plan for and align supply chain resources

audited_claims.notes: Likely Tier 1 operational improvement rather than transformation

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: 60x increase in data parameters (400 to 24,000) represents fundamental shift in aircraft data capability - enables entirely new analytics and services
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific metrics (400 vs 24,000 parameters), named technology (FOMAX), clear technical specification
audited_claims.notes: Infrastructure transformation enabling platform capabilities and new service models

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Data-for-platform-access model represents new business model - monetizing through data sharing rather than traditional licensing
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Clear business model description (shared value arrangement), specific terms (no cost for data sharing)
audited_claims.notes: Novel business model where data becomes currency for platform access

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Higher accuracy predictive maintenance represents new service capability - moving from scheduled to predictive maintenance model
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Clear capability description, outcome-focused (higher accuracy, maximized reliability), authoritative source
audited_claims.notes: Platform enabling new predictive service models for customers

tier_verification: Correctly classified as tier 1. Airbus has transformed from aircraft manufacturer to data platform provider, creating new business models (data-for-access), enabling network effects, and generating new revenue streams through platform services. Some claims (C8-C10) may be tier 1 operational improvements within the broader transformation story.
